original_text: And when the ark of the covenant of the Lord came into the camp, all Israel shouted with a great shout, so that the earth rang again.
korean_text: 여호와의 언약궤가 진영에 들어올 때에 온 이스라엘이 큰 소리로 외치매 땅이 울린지라

sentences.original_text: And when the ark of the covenant of the Lord came into the camp
all Israel shouted with a great shout
so that the earth rang again
